snippet.title: Rainbow Six Vegas 2 - Terrorist Hunt - Villa
snippet.description:
A demonstration of a Rainbow Six Vegas 2 terrorist hunt on the level "villa". The skill setting is realistic, with a high enemy density, and lone wolf set (you can do terrorist hunts with two AI team mates on single player too). This is the PC version of the game.

This time I thought I'd try out YouTube's 1080p option. All graphics settings are on their highest available options, with 4x antialiasing enabled. My system tends to run terrorists hunts over 60 FPS even with these settings, but recording hits performance of course, so I recorded this at 30 FPS.

Again, this is not meant to show amazing "skills", so if it makes you feel better you can throw in the "you're crap" comments. The strategy I use is much more defensive than most I have seen on YouTube, although it is relatively quick with a completion time of 3:26 in this particular instance.

The video seemed a little dull without background music, so I added an edit of "32 Ghosts IV" by "Nine Inch Nails". Please note that the vocal music during the last third of the video is actually coming from a room in the game, not the music I added.
